title: Summit's Harden on Low Volatility Investment Strategy (Audio)
itunes:title: Summit's Harden on Low Volatility Investment Strategy (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: David Harden, president and CIO of Summit Global Investments, discusses his low volatility investment strategy.
